snippet.title: Deceit 2 Official Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist Deceit 2 now on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2064870/Deceit_2?utm_source=youtube 

The original asymmetrical horror multiplayer is back for a sequel with innovative new gameplay, new content and characters, and a more intense atmosphere than you’ve experienced before.
Play another little game with us…coming soon to PC and console.
